plot: An astronaut and a moon maiden fall in love, but are separated by the vacuum of space. Will they choose love or life?
title: Moondance
plot_es: An astronaut and a moon maiden fall in love, but are separated by the vacuum of space. Will they choose love or life?
plot_en: An astronaut and a moon maiden fall in love, but are separated by the vacuum of space. Will they choose love or life?
